overview: Cofounder and Chief Executive Officer. Mr. Gupta played key roles in the management, business development, support, and solutions delivery of two startups: Sapient Corporation and ArcStream Solutions. Over the last 14 years, Mr. Gupta has led many complex, large-scale initiatives and successfully delivered for global corporations and start-ups in the US, Canada, Europe, and India. From 2003 onward, Mr. Gupta was part of a VC backed Mobile/Wireless startup, ArcStream Solutions, that was bought by a public company (Keane Inc.) in 2005. Prior to this Mr. Gupta worked at Sapient Corporation in various roles on key accounts. During his tenure at Sapient (1994 â€“ 2003), Sapient went public (NASD: SAPE) and grew to over 3500 people. Mr. Gupta holds a BS in electrical engineering from MP, India and M.S. in computer science from University of Massachusetts, USA.
